name: HOT: Niskin bottle samples
description: Monthly measurements of the thermohaline structure, water column chemistry, and primary production were collected at station ALOHA as part of the HOT program.

about.name: HOT ALOHA Niskin Bottles
about.description: Monthly measurements of the thermohaline structure, water column chemistry, and primary production were collected at station ALOHA as part of the HOT program.

citation: Karl, D. (2018) Niskin bottle water samples and CTD measurements from the Hawaii Ocean Time-Series cruises from 1988-2016 (HOT project)

provider.legalName: Biological & Chemical Oceanography Data Management Office
provider.name: BCO-DMO

funding.name: Collaborative Research: Nutritional Landscapes of Arctic Caribou: Observations, Experiments, and Models Provide Process-Level Understanding of Forage Traits and Trajectories

variableMeasured.name: Cruise
variableMeasured.description: Numeric cruise identifier for cruise of particular station visit.

variableMeasured.name: EXPOCODE
variableMeasured.description: Cruise identifier for cruise of particular station visit.

variableMeasured.name: WHPID
variableMeasured.description: WOCE Section code.

variableMeasured.name: STNNBR
variableMeasured.description: Station identifier; a unique number or alphanumeric string designating a general geographic location at which one or more sampling activities may occur. Artficially created if not assigned by time-series station.

variableMeasured.name: CASTNO
variableMeasured.description: Numeric cast (profile) number of sample.

variableMeasured.name: ROSETTE_POS
variableMeasured.description: Bottle number of sample.

variableMeasured.name: ISO_DateTime_UTC
variableMeasured.description: Date of sample in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ

variableMeasured.name: Latitude
variableMeasured.description: Latitude where water samples were collected; north is positive. Latitude is a geographic coordinate which refers to the angle from a point on the Earth's surface to the equatorial plane

variableMeasured.name: Longitude
variableMeasured.description: Longitude where water samples were collected; east is positive.

variableMeasured.name: CTDPRS
variableMeasured.description: Water pressure at measurement; depth reported as pressure; positive number increasing with water depth.

variableMeasured.name: CTDTMP
variableMeasured.description: The degree of hotness at any position within a volume of fresh or salt water expressed against the International Temperature Scale 1990 (ITS-90) calibration standard.

variableMeasured.name: CTDSAL
variableMeasured.description: CTD Salinity on PSS-78 scale

variableMeasured.name: QUALT1(1)
variableMeasured.description: WOCE quality flag of CTDSAL.

variableMeasured.name: CTDOXY
variableMeasured.description: CTD Oxygen

variableMeasured.name: QUALT1(2)
variableMeasured.description: WOCE quality flag of CTDOXY.

variableMeasured.name: SALINITY
variableMeasured.description: Bottle salinity of sample.

variableMeasured.name: QUALT1(3)
variableMeasured.description: WOCE quality flag of bottle salinity.

variableMeasured.name: OXYGEN
variableMeasured.description: Bottle oxygen concentration (Winkler) of sample.

variableMeasured.name: QUALT1(4)
variableMeasured.description: WOCE quality flag of bottle oxygen.

variableMeasured.name: NO2_NO3
variableMeasured.description: Nitrate plus nitrite concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT2(3)
variableMeasured.description: Nitrate plus nitrite quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: NO2
variableMeasured.description: Nitrite concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT10(5)
variableMeasured.description: Nitrite quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: PHSPHT
variableMeasured.description: Phosphate concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT2(2)
variableMeasured.description: Phosphate quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: SILCAT
variableMeasured.description: Silicate concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT2(4)
variableMeasured.description: Silicate quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: DIC
variableMeasured.description: Total dissolved inorganic carbon concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT1(5)
variableMeasured.description: Total dissolved inorganic carbon quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: ALKALIN
variableMeasured.description: Total alkalinity per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT1(6)
variableMeasured.description: Total alkalinity quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: pH
variableMeasured.description: pH value of sample on total scale at 25Â°C and 0dbar

variableMeasured.name: QUALT1(7)
variableMeasured.description: ph quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: PC
variableMeasured.description: Total particulate carbon concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT3(3)
variableMeasured.description: Total particulate carbon quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: PN
variableMeasured.description: Total particulate nitrogen concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT3(4)
variableMeasured.description: Total particulate nitrogen quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: PP
variableMeasured.description: Total particulate phosphorus concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT3(5)
variableMeasured.description: Total particulate phosphorus quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation

variableMeasured.name: DOC
variableMeasured.description: Dissolved organic carbon concentration per mass seawater

variableMeasured.name: QUALT2(7)
variableMeasured.description: Dissolved organic carbon quality flag; based on a PI established code; identifies a problem/quality issue with sample(s) from a given water bottle or single observation
